#summary Frequently Asked Questions

*Q: What does VAK stand for?*

A: *V* isual - *A* uditory - *K* inestetic


*Q: What's the basis for the analyis?*

A: Vakity is essentially a programmitic implementation of [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Learning_styles#Neil_Fleming.27s_VAK.2FVARK_model Neil Flemming's] VARK learning style model
